meta-philosophy.title: You Are Already Here
meta-philosophy.thesis: The Grove isn't something you visit. It's something you're already inside.

infrastructure-bet.title: The $380B Infrastructure Bet
infrastructure-bet.thesis: Big Tech is betting GDP-level capital that you'll rent intelligence forever.

ratchet-effect.title: The Ratchet Effect
ratchet-effect.thesis: AI capability propagates with predictable dynamics that favor distributed systems.

diary-system.title: The Diary System
diary-system.thesis: Agents develop identity through reflective self-narrative.

translation-emergence.title: The Emergence Pattern
translation-emergence.thesis: Capabilities emerge in AI systems without explicit training when the observer asks the right question.

technical-architecture.title: Under the Hood
technical-architecture.thesis: Grove's distributed architecture runs on commodity hardware today.
